com.xjeffrose.xio.http

Class Http2FrameForwarder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xjeffrose.xio.http.Http2FrameForwarder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.handler.codec.http2.Http2FrameListener

    public class Http2FrameForwarder
extends Object
implements io.netty.handler.codec.http2.Http2FrameListener
    Forwards the frame with stream id to the next handler in the pipeline
